name: Swagman 1/2" Locking Hitch Pin & Cable
description: This locking trailer hitch pin has a security cable for locking bikes. If the mechanism is exposed to lots of road grit and weather, periodically lubricate the lock with a spray lubricant to keep it operating smoothly.Triple chrome plated.10mm x 2.14m steel braided cable. One end is looped for girth hitching, the other threads through the hitch pin.Hidden pin cylinder adds an extra layer of security.Washer and lock washer are included to ensure a tight fit.Threaded ½in. pin fits class 1 and 2, 1¼ and 2in. universal receiver mounts.
